overview:
Matt is Canvas’s VP of Mobility responsible for the design and development of Canvas on the many different mobile platforms they support. Prior to Canvas, Matt was the lead architect for inCode Wireless’s (a VeriSign Company) enterprise mobility division. In this role, Matt and his team developed a unique mobility offering that ultimately won the 2007 Motorola Wireless Solution of the Year Award. Matt has also held software development and leadership roles at a number of mobile and wireless ventures including Peak Technologies, NEXIQ and groups supporting Rockwell. Matt is personally fluent in a multitude of programming languages and operating systems and he and his software development teams have been involved in the deployment of ten’s of thousands of mobile end users.

Matt is a graduate of Loras College (B.S. Mathmatics, B.S. Computer Science)
